about_the_game:
Oh Shit Boulder is a action runner game that involves the treasure hunter Ray to seek out the valuable cursed idol that is deep in the jungle. The idol only brings bad luck to the one that holds it, but the value is worth the risk. Follow Ray through his adventure to trade the idol to a wealthy museum owner.

Outrun the boulders, sharks, and other cursed objects that want the idols!
Run and jump by avoiding traps, spikes, pits, and wild life that is attracted by the cursed idol. Along the way, you will have to collect diamonds that can lead to secret path and control the idols curse.

Play through 5 different difficulty levels

* A hard to master game with unusual gameplay.
* Fast-paced, it requires good reflexes and dexterity.
* Short, it only takes an hour or two to beat.
* 2.5d Graphics mixture of 3d and 2d sprite objects
